Complete Dental Practice Management

From solo practices to large DSOs, MagnusOS provides everything you need to run a modern, efficient dental practice that delivers exceptional patient care and drives practice growth.

Scheduling & Recall Management

Intuitive calendar specifically for dental clinics with automated recall systems and appointment management.

  • Manage dentist and hygienist schedules
  • Operatory room coordination
  • Automated recall lists for cleanings
  • No-show tracking and follow-up

Dental EHR & Charting

Comprehensive dental records with visual tooth charts and integrated progress notes.

  • Visual tooth charts with point-and-click charting
  • Mark caries, restorations, and periodontal status
  • Past dental history tracking
  • Integrated intraoral photos and scans

Imaging Integration

Handle digital X-rays, panoramics, and CT scans with seamless integration and comparison tools.

  • Digital X-ray sensor integration
  • Panoramic and CT scan management
  • Side-by-side image comparison
  • Multi-location image access

Treatment Planning & Patient Education

Create and present treatment plans with clarity, including costs and alternatives.

  • Comprehensive treatment plan creation
  • Patient-friendly visual summaries
  • Cost breakdown and insurance pre-authorization
  • Alternative treatment options documentation

Billing, Insurance & Inventory

Integrated billing system with insurance claims processing and inventory management.

  • Automatic billing from completed treatments
  • CDT codes and insurance claim generation
  • Co-pay and deductible calculations
  • Dental supply inventory tracking

Multi-Practice Management

Scale to multiple locations with centralized management and reporting capabilities.

  • Multi-location practice support
  • Centralized reporting and analytics
  • Cross-location patient records
  • Unified billing and insurance processing

AI-Powered Dental Technology

AI-Driven Dental Excellence

MagnusOS brings cutting-edge AI technology to dental practices, providing diagnostic assistance, treatment planning, and workflow optimization that enhances both practitioner confidence and patient outcomes.

AI Diagnostic Aids

AI tools analyze radiographs to highlight potential cavities, calculus, and periapical lesions.

  • Automatic cavity detection on bitewing X-rays
  • Calculus and pathology identification
  • Periapical lesion highlighting
  • Second opinion for busy days

Example: AI scans bitewing X-rays to highlight potential cavities in red for dentist review, helping catch early lesions that might be subtle.

Orthodontic Treatment Simulation

Simulate teeth movement for orthodontic cases using digital impressions and AI predictions.

  • Digital impression analysis
  • Teeth movement animation
  • Treatment duration prediction
  • Extraction and IPR recommendations

Example: Show patients an animation of how their teeth could align over time with clear aligners, helping them commit to treatment.

Smile Design

Create virtual mock-ups of veneers or whitening results using AI-assisted smile design.

  • Automatic tooth edge identification
  • Ideal shape and shade proposals
  • Before/after smile simulations
  • Patient visualization tools

Example: AI assists by automatically identifying tooth edges and proposing ideal shapes and shades for smile makeovers.

Voice Charting & Notes

Hands-free documentation using voice commands for common charting tasks.

  • Voice commands for charting
  • Dental terminology recognition
  • Hands-free documentation
  • Sterility maintenance

Example: Dentists can say "tooth 18: occlusal caries" and it will be automatically charted, maintaining sterility.

Real-World Success Story

"Integrating MagnusOS's AI led to a 15% increase in diagnosed and treated caries. The AI would flag early lesions on X-rays that were then confirmed and treated, which previously might have been observed until bigger. We also reported consultations for advanced procedures were more successful because the simulation tools helped patients visualize results and say yes."

— Bright Dental Practice

Seamless Integration & Security

MagnusOS integrates seamlessly with your existing dental systems while providing enterprise-grade security and compliance features designed specifically for dental practices.

Cloud & On-Premise Deployment

Flexible deployment options to meet your practice's needs and compliance requirements.

  • Hybrid cloud architecture for scalability
  • On-premise deployment for data control
  • Automatic data synchronization
  • Offline capability with sync when online

Security & Compliance

Built-in security features and compliance with healthcare data protection standards.

  • End-to-end encryption for all data
  • HIPAA and GDPR compliance
  • Role-based access controls
  • Audit trails for all activities

Mobile & Web Access

Access your practice management tools from anywhere with responsive design.

  • Mobile-optimized interface
  • Cross-platform compatibility
  • Real-time synchronization
  • Offline mobile capabilities

Third-Party Integrations

Seamlessly connect with existing tools and systems in your practice.

  • Payment processing integration
  • Accounting software connectivity
  • Insurance claim processing
  • Digital imaging system integration
